channel.title: DeviationX || Spawn-PK || VPS hosted - 24/7!
channel.description:
[size=12pt][CENTER][img]http://i.imgur.com/iLqtNJL.png[/img]
[B]Information: [/B]DeviationX is an up and coming RSPS, 24/7 hosted on a no lag VPS. The website and forums are due to be revamped, so please do not let this deter you. We are an excellent PK server, anybody is able to join and instantly begin PKing. There are goals to work towards, reasons to skill, there are plenty of minigames to play.
[URL=http://"https://www.dropbox.com/s/dxjn3txwrni3tkk/Deviationx.jar?dl=1"]Click here to download the client now![/URL]
[spoiler=Forums media!][URL=http://"http://www.deviationx.org"]IPB Forums! Click here to visit![/URL] [pre][img]https://i.gyazo.com/d1daedf5450063373b4b366698b30c39.jpg[/img][/pre]
[img]https://i.gyazo.com/0021554c003e8fa22b4522da33deba5a.png[/img] [/spoiler]
[spoiler=Content] [ul][*]Minigames (including castle wars) [*]Working random events (shooting star) [*]Curses, chaoitcs, nex armour, primal armour [*]PVP armour [*]Completionist, Max and Veteran cape [*]Full spawning abilities [*]No lag, 24/7 hosted [*]Plenty of bosses [*]Boss pets [*]Lottery [*]Gambling [*]Working duel arena [*]Working fight pits [*]Full wave fight caves [*]Overloads and extremes [*]Working combat system, instant switching for hybridding[/ul]
[/spoiler]
[spoiler=Media]Agile armour - a mix of Vesta, Zuriel and Morrigan armour, only available to Maxed players. [img]https://i.gyazo.com/ee02264a5c11c311f2caa37d329fea38.gif[/img]
[img]https://i.gyazo.com/439d0f035da94294303a7cb44f23051f.gif[/img]
Random event: shooting star [img]https://i.gyazo.com/5f0d0ae5ede5edc23fc296b158e5ffd0.gif[/img]
[url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=kqJ0MDSL3v0]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=kqJ0MDSL3v0[/url]
[url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-cPGnRjuPy4]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-cPGnRjuPy4[/url] [/spoiler]
[spoiler=Support us!]Copy and paste this code into your signature!
[url=http://i.imgur.com/iLqtNJL.png]http://i.imgur.com/iLqtNJL.png[/url] [url=https://www.upload.ee/image/5482174/cooltext159617652902844.png]https://www.upload.ee/image/5482174/cooltext159617652902844.png[/url]

item.title: DeviationX || Spawn-PK || VPS hosted - 24/7!
item.dc:creator: @DeviationX DeviationX
item.description:
@DeviationX wrote:

[size=12pt][CENTER]

Information: DeviationX is an up and coming RSPS, 24/7 hosted on a no lag VPS. The website and forums are due to be revamped, so please do not let this deter you. We are an excellent PK server, anybody is able to join and instantly begin PKing. There are goals to work towards, reasons to skill, there are plenty of minigames to play.

Click here to download the client now!

[spoiler=Forums media!]IPB Forums! Click here to visit!
[pre]

d1daedf5450063373b4b366698b30c39.jpg1196×686
[/pre]

0021554c003e8fa22b4522da33deba5a.png802×695

[/spoiler]

[spoiler=Content]
[ul][]Minigames (including castle wars)
[]Working random events (shooting star)
[]Curses, chaoitcs, nex armour, primal armour
[]PVP armour
[]Completionist, Max and Veteran cape
[]Full spawning abilities
[]No lag, 24/7 hosted
[]Plenty of bosses
[]Boss pets
[]Lottery
[]Gambling
[]Working duel arena
[]Working fight pits
[]Full wave fight caves
[]Overloads and extremes
[]Working combat system, instant switching for hybridding[/ul]

[/spoiler]

[spoiler=Media]Agile armour - a mix of Vesta, Zuriel and Morrigan armour, only available to Maxed players.

Random event: shooting star
